description: SQUIRE MECH ENGINEERING (PVT) LTD Vs. ILLAYPERUMA KODITUWAKKUARACHCHILAGE DAYANANDA before Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J

keywords: An abuse of the process of Court-Objection raised by the Respondent Counsel that the instant revision application filed before this Court is an abuse of process of court as the same is impugned in the relevant Civil Appellate High Court-The criteria to be adopted in determining on the question of abuse of court process-Doctrine of Judicial Economy, Consistency, finality or the integrity of the Administration of Justice
legistation: Article 138 of Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
